languages.text: {n}Кибелла отворачивается... и, словно что-то вспомнив, вновь смотрит на вас.{/n} "Домин'{name}... наш разговор не окончен. Прошу, останься со мной еще на несколько минут. Есть кое-что, о чем я хочу спросить тебя".

{n}She looks away... but then turns back to you as if remembering something.{/n} "Domin'{name}... our conversation is not yet over. Please, stay with me for a few moments. There is something I want to ask."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла отворачивается... и, словно что-то вспомнив, вновь смотрит на вас.{/n} "Домин'{name}... наш разговор не окончен. Прошу, останься со мной еще на несколько минут. Есть кое-что, о чем я хочу спросить тебя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah looks away... But looks at you again as if having remembered something.{/n} "Enim'{name}... Our conversation is not over yet. Please stay with me for a few moments. There's something I want to ask."

{n}Kibellah looks away... But looks at you again as if having remembered something.{/n} "Enim'{name}... Our conversation is not over yet. Please stay with me for a few moments. There's something I want to ask."

{n}Kibellah looks away... but then turns back to you as if remembering something.{/n} "Enim'{name}... our conversation is not yet over. Please, stay with me for a few moments. There is something I want to ask."

{n}Kibellah looks away... but then turns back to you as if remembering something.{/n} "Enim'{name}... our conversation is not yet over. Please, stay with me for a few moments. There is something I want to ask."

{n}She looks away... but then turns back to you as if remembering something.{/n} "Domin'{name}... our conversation is not yet over. Please, stay with me for a few moments. There is something I want to ask."

{n}She looks away... but then turns back to you as if remembering something.{/n} "Domin'{name}... our conversation is not yet over. Please, stay with me for a few moments. There is something I want to ask."

languages.text: {n}Sie wendet den Blick ab ... dreht sich dann aber wieder zu dir um, als würde sie sich an etwas erinnern.{/n} "Domin'{name}... unsere Unterhaltung ist noch nicht vorbei. Bitte bleibt noch einen Moment hier. Ich möchte Euch etwas fragen."
languages.original_text: {n}She looks away... but then turns back to you as if remembering something.{/n} "Domin'{name}... our conversation is not yet over. Please, stay with me for a few moments. There is something I want to ask."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie wendet den Blick ab ... dreht sich dann aber wieder zu dir um, als würde sie sich an etwas erinnern.{/n} "Domin'{name}... unsere Unterhaltung ist noch nicht vorbei. Bitte bleibt noch einen Moment hier. Ich möchte Euch etwas fragen."

languages.text: {n}Ella aparta la mirada... pero luego se vuelve hacia ti como si hubiese recordado algo.{/n} «Domin'{name}... nuestra conversación aún no ha terminado. Por favor, quédese conmigo un rato más. Quisiera preguntarle una cosa».
languages.original_text: {n}She looks away... but then turns back to you as if remembering something.{/n} "Domin'{name}... our conversation is not yet over. Please, stay with me for a few moments. There is something I want to ask."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ella aparta la mirada... pero luego se vuelve hacia ti como si hubiese recordado algo.{/n} «Domin'{name}... nuestra conversación aún no ha terminado. Por favor, quédese conmigo un rato más. Quisiera preguntarle una cosa».

languages.text: {n}彼女は目をそらして…しかし、何かを思い出したかのようにこちらを振り向く。{/n}「ドミン・{name}…私たちの会話はまだ終わっていないわ。ねぇ、しばらく私と一緒にいて。訊きたいことがあるの」
languages.original_text: {n}She looks away... but then turns back to you as if remembering something.{/n} "Domin'{name}... our conversation is not yet over. Please, stay with me for a few moments. There is something I want to ask."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は目をそらして…しかし、何かを思い出したかのようにこちらを振り向く。{/n}「エニム・{name}…私たちの会話はまだ終わっていないわ。ねぇ、しばらく私と一緒にいて。訊きたいことがあるの」

languages.text: {n}她望向别处……随后又向你转过了身，仿佛想起了什么事情。{/n}“秘者{name}……我们之间的谈话还没有结束。请和我待一会儿吧，我有件事情想问你。”
languages.original_text: {n}She looks away... but then turns back to you as if remembering something.{/n} "Domin'{name}... our conversation is not yet over. Please, stay with me for a few moments. There is something I want to ask."

traits.locale_text: {n}她望向别处……随后又向你转过了身，仿佛想起了什么事情。{/n}“秘者{name}……我们之间的谈话还没有结束。请和我待一会儿吧，我有件事情想问你。”

languages.text: {n}Elle détourne le regard... avant de faire volte-face comme si elle venait de se souvenir de quelque chose.{/n} « Domin'{name}... notre conversation n'est pas encore terminée. Je vous prie de bien vouloir m'accorder encore quelques instants. J'ai quelque chose à vous demander. »
languages.original_text: {n}She looks away... but then turns back to you as if remembering something.{/n} "Domin'{name}... our conversation is not yet over. Please, stay with me for a few moments. There is something I want to ask."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle détourne le regard... avant de faire volte-face comme si elle venait de se souvenir de quelque chose.{/n} « Domin'{name}... notre conversation n'est pas encore terminée. Je vous prie de bien vouloir m'accorder encore quelques instants. J'ai quelque chose à vous demander. »

languages.text: {n}Bakışlarını çeviriyor ama ardından sanki bir şey hatırlamış gibi yeniden sana dönüyor.{/n} "Domin'{name}... Konuşmamız henüz bitmedi. Lütfen bir süre daha yanımda kal. Sormak istediğim bir şey var."
languages.original_text: {n}She looks away... but then turns back to you as if remembering something.{/n} "Domin'{name}... our conversation is not yet over. Please, stay with me for a few moments. There is something I want to ask."
